document.full_text: google inc said it has set aside $500 million to potentially settle u.s. justice department's probe into the company's online advertising practices, signaling yet another row with the regulators.
document.title: google sets aside $500 million for advertising probe
lines_and_colors: google inc said it has set aside $500 million to potentially settle u.s. justice department's probe into the company's online advertising practices, signaling yet another row with the regulators.
